description:
cmd/dist: Make verbose messages print to stderr

Made the following changes:
 - Export errprintf() from all three OS-specific modules
 - Added errprintf() to a.h
 - Moved errprintf() in windows.c under xprintf(), since they are so similar
 - Replaced all instances of xprintf() with errprintf() where a vflag check is done
Fixes issue 3788.

messages.text:
LGTM

Thank you. Do not need long CL descriptions. Your code changes speak for themselves.

Alex

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: alex.brainman@gmail.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=080799c3785f ***

cmd/dist: Make verbose messages print to stderr

Made the following changes:
 - Export errprintf() from all three OS-specific modules
 - Added errprintf() to a.h
 - Moved errprintf() in windows.c under xprintf(), since they are so similar
 - Replaced all instances of xprintf() with errprintf() where a vflag check is done
Fixes issue 3788.
